justification: “The 51-item Exercise Motivation Inventory-2 (EMI-2, Ingledew et al., 1998) was used to assess individuals' self-reported motives for exercise…”
“Physical activity steps at baseline were assessed from Fitbit Charge 2 portable devices over a period of seven days.”

topic_or_construct: Physical activity guideline adherence (moderate / vigorous minutes)
justification: “Minutes spent in moderate and vigorous intensity (based on Fitbit's algorithmic classification…) were used to generate binary variables indicating whether or not participants met physical activity guidelines.”

measured_by: Non-exercise fitness estimation equation (Jurca et al., 2005) using gender, age, BMI, resting HR, SRPA
justification: “Using a strategy established by Jurca et al. (2005)… The final estimated CRF value was then computed through the provided equation: CRF = Gender (2.77) ‑Age (.10) ‑BMI (.17) ‑RHR (.03) + SRPA + 18.07.”
“Participants graded their habitual physical activity across multiple contexts, providing an SRPA index value on a scale from 0 (inactive) to 4 (more than 3 hours of aerobic exercise weekly).”
